text: #CARecall Update 9/7 via @Political_Data #PDI shows 3.3M reg Dems have voted (32% turnout) and 1.5M reg Reps have voted (28% turnout) for current ballot lead of 1.8M for Dems. However Reps are expected (theoretically) to cast more votes on E-day (they are scared of mail ballots) https://t.co/nNtekLnj0g
